topic: Psychological barriers to adopting AI in energy management
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that the problem I'm avoiding involves stepping out of my comfort zone due to underlying fears of failure or change. As a next step, I will set aside time to reflect on these fears, perhaps journaling to uncover their roots, and then create a small, actionable plan to address the issue incrementally. This might involve seeking advice from a mentor or taking a small step towards confronting the challenge directly.
